snippet: The Other Israel Film Festival shows barriers of many kinds for Israelis and their neighbors, and Israelis among themselves.
abstract: Selections at the sixth annual Other Israel Film Festival, which seeks to inspire dialogue and understanding in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict, reflect a feeling of bleak dispair.
lead_paragraph: The Other Israel Film Festival shows barriers of many kinds for Israelis and their neighbors, and Israelis among themselves.

headline.seo: Other Israel Film Festivtal Explores a Fractured Nation
headline.main: Films Show an Israel Divided From Its Neighbors and Itself
headline.print_headline: Films Show an Israel Divided From Its Neighbors and Itself
